caption.p: ( a) Electrochemical system with the microdevice. 0.4 V (vs. Ag/AgCl) was applied to WE1 and sweeping potential between 0.4 and 0.8 V (vs. Ag/AgCl) was applied to WE2. The electrical current of WE1 and WE2 at different scan rate of WE2 (( b): 0.01 mV/s, ( c): 0.1 mV/s, ( d): 1 mV/s, and ( e): 10 mV/s).
